panels.title: CPU Usage vs Limits (by Resource Group)

panels.description: CPU usage as percentage of CPU rate limit for each resource group. Shows how close each group is to its configured limit.
panels.title: AVG CPU Usage vs Rate Limit (% of Limit Used)
AVG CPU Usage vs Limit Over Time (% of Limit)

panels.description: CPU usage skew ratio across all hosts. Values >1.3 indicate uneven CPU distribution.
panels.title: CPU Usage Skew Ratio
Absolute CPU Usage by Host and Resource Group
Memory Usage vs Limits (by Resource Group)

panels.description: Memory usage as percentage of memory limit for each resource group. Note: -1 or 0 limit means UNLIMITED (not shown here, see absolute usage below).
panels.title: Memory Usage vs Limit (% of Limit Used) - LIMITED GROUPS ONLY

panels.description: Memory usage skew ratio across all hosts. Values >1.3 indicate uneven memory distribution.
panels.title: Memory Usage Skew Ratio
Memory Usage by Host and Resource Group (with Limits)

panels.description: Number of running sessions (active queries) per resource group. High values indicate high workload.
panels.title: Running Sessions by Resource Group

panels.description: Number of sessions queued for execution due to insufficient resources. ANY value > 0 indicates resource saturation!
panels.title: Queueing Sessions by Resource Group (Resource Saturation Indicator)
Running vs Queueing Sessions Over Time
